TopicTitle: (SOLVED) Random red target always on the ground

Articles.Content:
Okay, so I'll be flying around, and all the time I'm airborne, there is this red target at the point of projected impact that moves around with the craft.

It disappears while on the ground but will not go away in the air. It doesn't go away with f2 either.

I have many mods installed, but the only three I can think of that would be doing this are BDArmory Continued, Vessel Mover Continued, and Waypoint Manager. If it's a mod feature there's probably a setting somewhere but I cannot find it.

 

Any ideas on what this could be? I'm using 1.4.5 by the way.

 

Edited August 17, 2018 by Ultimate Steve

Do you use the 1.1.5.3 beta release of KER? Probably a bug of the suicide burn feature.

edit: I just checked the repo and this seems to be no longer a beta but the question is still the same^^

Edited August 17, 2018 by 4x4cheesecake

Not bdac and vessel mover...

Never seen this type of marker in those two mods

4 minutes ago, 4x4cheesecake said:

Do you use the 1.1.5.3 beta release of KER? Probably a bug of the suicide burn feature.

edit: I just checked the repo and this seems to be no longer a beta but the question is still the same^^

Hmm, I checked and I do seem to be using that version. On github I found this:

  • Added impact marker to map and flight view. Toggleable via the Impact Marker readout button.

I guess I should try toggling it, will report in a few mins.

7 minutes ago, 4x4cheesecake said:

Do you use the 1.1.5.3 beta release of KER? Probably a bug of the suicide burn feature.

edit: I just checked the repo and this seems to be no longer a beta but the question is still the same^^

Yup, this was it and there is a button for it in the engineer! Thank you!
I recall BDA having a bomb impact prediction marker. But I remember it only showing up when a bomb was selected as the active weapon.

3 minutes ago, Ultimate Steve said:

Toggleable via the Impact Marker readout button.

I skipped the 'toggleable' part when I read the changelog, so yeah, maybe not a bug but a feature^^

Nice, a pick your grave site indicator.  

Jeb should find that useful.
